job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Software Engineering, or a related field.

jd: Hello , This is Abhishek Yadav from Tanisha Systems . I am hiring for below urgent role in Dallas TX. Title : : Cloud Development EngineerLocation : Dallas TXType-: Contract Exp. 10+ Years Job descriptionKey Responsibilities:•Design, develop, and maintain cloud applications on Microsoft Azure using Java.•Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and implement new features.•Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability.•Ensure application security and compliance with best practices.•Monitor and troubleshoot application performance and reliability.•Implement CI/CD pipelines for efficient deployment and integration.•Participate in code reviews and maintain documentation for development processes.•Stay up to date with emerging technologies and industry trends in cloud computing. Qualifications:•Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Software Engineering, or a related field.•Proven experience in cloud application development, particularly with Azure.•Strong proficiency in Java and related frameworks (e.g., Spring Boot).•Experience with cloud services (e.g., Azure Functions, Azure App Services, Azure DevOps).•Familiarity with database technologies (e.g., SQL, NoSQL).•Knowledge of RESTful APIs and microservices architecture.•Understanding of Agile methodologies and best practices in software development.•Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.•Strong communication and teamwork abilities. Preferred Qualifications:•Certifications in Azure (e.g., Azure Developer Associate).•Experience with containerization technologies (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes).•Familiarity with frontend technologies (e.g., Angular, React) is a plus.
